title: Chicken, spring onion, chilli and wild rice grain bowl
description: A simple, satisfying lunch that is perfect for using up leftover roast chicken.

default: ½ green chilli, finely chopped (or to taste)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Cook the wild rice according to packet instructions, then drain.
Place the rice in the bowl you plan to eat from and add the rocket, chicken, spring onions, red pepper, chilli and mint.
Drizzle liberally with the oil and season with salt and pepper. Eat straight away or pack in your lunchbox ready to take to work.
